description: The Fact Core contains information, but it's up to you to decide if it's true or if we just have a few bad sectors on our drives.  Generally speaking, trusting the Fact Core is about like trusting nothing bad will happen when you pull your uncle's finger.
exampleInteractions: Alexa, tell Fact Core to give me a fact.
Alexa, ask Fact Core what does it know.
name: Portal2 Fact Core
shortDescription: Well, so you want to learn something.  The Fact Core can assist, but it's up to you to decide if it's true or if we have experienced some data corruption.
